components.Activity.Payment.status_error: There was a problem sending your payment.
components.Activity.Payment.status_proce: Zap is processing your payment. This can take up to 01:00 min.
components.Activity.Transaction.status_e: There was a problem sending your transaction.
components.Activity.Transaction.status_p: Zap is processing your transaction. This can take up to 01:00 min.
components.Channels.base_fee_description: The required number of {currencyName} per kilo-weight that the requester will pay at all times, for both the funding transaction and commitment transaction.
components.Channels.close_channel_dialog: I understand this is an irreversible action

Are you sure you want to force close this channel? By performing an uncooperative close (force close), your funds will be locked for {csvDelay, plural, zero {0 blocks} one {1 block} other {{csvDelay} blocks}} before being spendable again in your wallet.
Are you sure you want to close this channel?
components.Channels.commit_fee_descripti: The amount to be paid in fees for the current set of commitment transactions.
components.Channels.csv_delay_descriptio: In the event of an uncooperative close (force close) of this channel, the time lock is the number of blocks you will have to wait before you can claim your funds again.
components.Channels.csv_delay_value: {csvDelay, plural, zero {0 blocks} one {1 block} other {{csvDelay} blocks}}
components.Channels.funding_transaction_: The transaction that opened this channel, as recorded in the blockchain. You can click the link on the right to view this transaction in a block explorer.
components.Channels.node_search_descript: Search for a node or paste a node pubkey. Example: publickey@host
components.Channels.num_updates_descript: The total number of updates within this channel.
components.Channels.open_channel_form_de: To open a channel, enter the desired node's publickey@host, set the amount of BTC you'd like to commit to the channel, and submit.
components.Channels.total_received_descr: The total value you've received within this channel.
components.Channels.total_sent_descripti: The total value you've sent within this channel.
components.Contacts.AddChannel.manual_de: Hm, looks like we can't see that node from here, wanna try to manually connect?
components.Contacts.ConnectManually.desc: Enter the address of a node that you would like to open a channel to.
components.Contacts.Network.title: My Network
components.Contacts.SubmitChannelForm.de: Opening a channel will help you send and receive money on the Lightning Network. You aren't spending any money, rather moving the money you plan to use onto the network.
components.Contacts.SubmitChannelForm.du: You currently have {activeChannels, plural, zero {no active channels} one {1 active channel} other {{activeChannels} active channels}} open to {aliasMsg, select, this_node {this node} other {{aliasMsg}}} with a capacity of
components.Contacts.SuggestedNodes.empty: Hmmm, looks like you don't have any channels yet. Here are some suggested nodes to open a channel with to get started.
Hmmm, looks like you don't have any channels yet. Open some channels to get started.
components.Home.delete_wallet_dialog_ack: I understand this is an irreversible action
components.Home.delete_wallet_dialog_hea: Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?
components.Home.delete_wallet_dialog_war: Deleting the wallet data may cause loss of funds. All data from the following wallet directory will be removed:
components.Home.no_active_wallet_message: Please select a wallet from the wallets menu.
components.Home.no_wallets_message: Unfortunately you donâ€™t have any wallets ðŸ˜¢
components.Home.wallet_settings_alias_de: The alias will be visible for others on the network.
components.Home.wallet_settings_name_des: The wallet name is only visible for you inside Zap.
components.Onboarding.Steps.alias_descri: Set your node alias to help others connect with you on the Lightning Network
components.Onboarding.Steps.autopilot_de: Autopilot is an automatic network manager. Instead of manually adding people to build your network to make payments, enable autopilot to automatically connect you to the Lightning Network using 60% of your balance.
components.Onboarding.Steps.cert_descrip: Path to the lnd tls cert. Example: /path/to/tls.cert
components.Onboarding.Steps.confirm_conn: Confirm the connection details for your Lightning node.
components.Onboarding.Steps.connection_d: Let Zap spin up and manage a node for you, or connect to your own node.
Enter the connection details for your Lightning node.
components.Onboarding.Steps.connection_t: How do you want to connect to the Lightning Network?
Connect to your own BTCPay Server instance to access your BTCPay Server wallet.
Let Zap create a new bitcoin wallet and lightning node for you.
Enter the connection details for your own Lightning node to access access it with Zap.
Import your own seed to recover an existing wallet.
components.Onboarding.Steps.connection_u: Paste the full content of your BTCPay Server connection config file. This can be found by clicking the link entitled 'Click here to open the configuration file' in your BTCPay Server gRPC settings.
Paste an Lnd Connect URI. You can generate one of these using the lndconnect utility. Example: "lndconnect://1.2.3.4:10009?cert=x&macaroon=y"
components.Onboarding.Steps.create_walle: Looks like you are new here. Set a password to encrypt your wallet. This password will be needed to unlock Zap in the future
components.Onboarding.Steps.default_desc: By selecting the default mode we will do everything for you. Just click and go!
components.Onboarding.Steps.hostname_des: Hostname and port of the Lnd gRPC interface. Example: localhost:10009
components.Onboarding.Steps.import_descr: Recovering a wallet, nice. You don't need anyone else, you got yourself :)
components.Onboarding.Steps.login_descri: Please enter your wallet password to unlock it.
components.Onboarding.Steps.macaroon_des: Path to the lnd macaroon file. Example: /path/to/admin.macaroon
components.Onboarding.Steps.password_des: You would have set your password when first creating your walet. This is separate from your 24 word seed.
components.Onboarding.Steps.password_err: Password must be at least {passwordMinLength} characters long
components.Onboarding.Steps.retype_seed_: Your seed is important! If you lose your seed you'll have no way to recover your wallet. To make sure that you have properly saved your seed, please retype words {word1}, {word2} & {word3}
components.Onboarding.Steps.save_seed_de: Please save these 24 words securely! This will allow you to recover your wallet in the future
components.Onboarding.Steps.seed_warning: Keep this private! If someone gains access to this list they can steal your money.
components.Onboarding.Steps.signup_descr: Would you like to create a new wallet or import an existing one?
components.Onboarding.Steps.verify_host_: Are you sure you want to connect to
components.Onboarding.Steps.wallet_name_: Set a name for your wallet to help you identify it in Zap. This is for internal purposes only and will not be broadcast on the Lightning Network.
What do you want to call this wallet?
components.Pay.description: You can send {chain} ({ticker}) through the Lightning Network or make a On-Chain Transaction. Just paste your Lightning Payment Request or the {chain} Address in the field below. Zap will guide you to the process.
components.Pay.error_not_enough_funds: You do not have enough funds available to make this payment.
